Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone that shows how it allows two students to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate the parts of the string telephone, including cups and a string connecting them.
The student can show how sound travels through the string when one student speaks into a cup.
The student can depict how the second student listens through the other cup to receive the sound.
The student can represent how the string needs to be stretched tight for the communication device to work effectively, demonstrating the importance of design features.
